mapper.select: select s.*,t.prj_name,o.om_name,u.u_name from signet_manage s,task t,organization_management o,user u,mode_status m where s.prj_id=t.prj_id and s.om_id=o.om_id and s.signet_man=u.user_id and s.sm_id=m.mode_id and m.status=#{status}
mapper.insert: insert into signet_manage (sm_id,prj_id, om_id, application_date, signet_name, signet_man, sm_desc) values ( #{signetManage.smId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.prjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.omId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.applicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.signetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.signetMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.smDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update signet_manage set prj_id = #{signetManage.prjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, om_id = #{signetManage.omId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_date = #{signetManage.applicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_name = #{signetManage.signetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_man = #{signetManage.signetMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm_desc = #{signetManage.smDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sm_id = #{signetManage.smId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
